question.text: You are parked in a busy high street. What is the safest way to turn your vehicle around so you can go the opposite way?

explanation.text: Make sure you carry out the manoeuvre without causing a hazard to other vehicles. Choose a place to turn which is safe and convenient for you and for other road users.

answer.text: Find a quiet side road to turn round in
Drive into a side road and reverse into the main road
Get someone to stop the traffic
